original_text: Into his right hand comes the divination for Jerusalem, to set battering rams, to open the mouth with murder, to lift up the voice with shouting, to set battering rams against the gates, to cast up mounds, to build siege towers.
korean_text: 오른손에 예루살렘으로 갈 점괘를 얻었으므로 공성퇴를 설치하며 입을 벌리고 죽이며 소리를 높여 외치며 성문을 향하여 공성퇴를 설치하고 토성을 쌓고 사다리를 세우게 되었나니

sentences.original_text: Into his right hand comes the divination for Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 오른손에는 예루살렘을 위한 점괘가 들어온다

sentences.original_text: to open the mouth with murder
to lift up the voice with shouting
to set battering rams against the gates
